content: Colonel in the Singaporean armed forces **Karen Tan Puay Kiow** (born 1962) was the first woman to reach the rank of [colonel](/wiki/Colonel) in the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces). In 2014 she was inducted into the [Singapore Women's Hall of Fame](/wiki/Singapore_Women%27s_Hall_of_Fame). Tan retired from the army in 2007 and became general manager of [ST Electronics](/wiki/ST_Electronics). She is married and has two sons This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This biographical article related to an Asian military person is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Karen Tan Puay Kiow
